style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=3;strokeColor=#008A00;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-1" y="420" width="410" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ntxPiBwe0OYDK6RUi38M-1" value="<b style="">Metadata</b>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=3;strokeColor=#990000;fontColor=#990000;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry y="50" width="410" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="vzDzONqJHbcVR0kDVfDj-1" value="<div><b>Certified Data Credential</b></div><b>Verifiable Credential Document</b>" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="s8GA2kTPBjS3v5yILpQJ-1" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=3;strokeColor=#D80073;fontColor=#ffffff;fillColor=none;" parent="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="s8GA2kTPBjS3v5yILpQJ-6" value="<font style="" color="#007fff"><b>DigitalProductPassport: &lt;&lt;SemanticId Aspect Key&gt;&gt;</b></font>" id="98F0K6zIz_6dA5CPPPwF-1" value="<b><font color="#d80073">parent: &lt;&lt;Parent Version Metadata&gt;&gt;</font></b>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" id="98F0K6zIz_6dA5CPPPwF-4" value="<b style=""><font color="#d80073">@id: &lt;&lt;DID Web or link to the specific parent version&gt;&gt;</font></b><div><div style="line-height: 130%;"><b><font color="#d80073">digestMultibase: &lt;&lt;Hash Checksum from Parent Document&gt;</font></b></div></div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="18" y="125" width="372" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="98F0K6zIz_6dA5CPPPwF-5" value="<b><font color="#007fff">Digital Product Passport Instance JSON&nbsp;</font></b><div><b><font color="#007fff">Payload Content</font></b></div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#007FFF;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="20" y="290" width="370" height="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
